alert.note: Alert for Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Williamsburg County through 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hebron, or 8 miles northwest of Kingstree. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingstree, Hebron and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
